channel.title: Tomb - Hern [Experimental]
channel.description:
Here's another single from my upcoming album, Smoke. This cut is a lot more melodic and slow paced than my last single, though it still has some weird experimentation to it. The intro is a pitched down sample of me playing my guitar when it was out of tune. Like I said with the last single, don't expect the album to be exactly like this. I feel like any track I would've chosen would have been misleading, so I'm mainly just picking my favorites as singles.
Anyway, here is the song: https://soundcloud.com/hernmusicofficial/tomb
I hope you guys enjoy this. If you have any constructive criticism, please feel free to give it.

item.title: Tomb - Hern [Experimental]
item.dc:creator: iammane
item.description:
I was gonna say, I know @Hern-Meridian exclusively uses Auxy. There’s some folks around here or who used to post here (DoJ comes to mind, K-Ro) that are or were 100% Auxy and did not sound AT ALL like Auxy. Really bending the app to the limits

Read full topic

item.description:
As of right now, everything I make is in Auxy

item.title: Tomb - Hern [Experimental]
item.dc:creator: lemonboy
item.description:
Okay it sounds good. But in my opinion, I think it’s just a non auxy track. Just saying. Good job on the song though.
